note:
Lifelong political junkie born an extreme animal lover, especially cats. Retired from our production/advertising company Hot Productions, Ltd.  Sold our carriage house (pictured in logo) and Feng Shui garden, Bonnieview in Merion Station, PA after 41 yrs. David Sinclair’s anti-aging Lifespan protocol is my daily mission. My avatar was my chocolate brownie business in the late ‘70s, early 80’s.
Liberal all my life.
